item.title: My Paper Review: Promptriever - Instruction-Trained Retrievers
item.description: Here’s my full 35-slide review of the ICLR 2025 paper, Promptriever. In this post, I break down the core concepts, training methods, and results of a new retriever that’s trained to follow natural language instructions.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
